long_description: The Giro Advantage 2 helmet represents the pinnacle of aerodynamic performance and competition-proven design and fit. Wear it for time trials and triathlons; Advantage 2 helmet is perfect for when every thousandth of a second counts. Roc Loc 5, the newest retention system from Giro, makes adjusting fit tension and vertical position easier and more comfortable than ever; loosen/tighten with a simple twist. Wind Tunnel(TM) ventilation with 5 active vents and internal exhaust channels thrust cool, fresh air over and around the head, while forcing out heat and stale air. In-mold technology bonds the helmet's tough outer microshell to the impact-absorbing expanded polystyrene liner, creating a light, cool and strong helmet.
